description: Individual Height Adjustable Work Surfaces for use in Healthcare setting.
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal

### Title

Furniture Request for Proposal (RFP) for 2655 Lancaster Rd

### Reference and Solicitation Numbers

* Reference Number: cb-61-25891533
* Solicitation Number: 1000254829

### Amendment Information

This RFP has undergone six (6) amendments since its release on November 10, 2023. The latest amendment was made on November 27, 2023.

### Tender Status

The RFP is now expired. Any proposal submissions made after the closing date of November 27, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EST, will not be accepted.

### Contract Information

* Scheduled Contract Start Date: January 8, 2024
* Scheduled Contract End Date: March 29, 2024

### Procurement Category and Notice Type

This RFP is a competitive selection process governed under the Goods and Services category with a Product ID of *56100000. The notice type is a Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement.

### Procurement Method

The procurement method is competitive, with selective tendering.

### Selection Criteria

The proposal with the lowest price will be selected.

### Important Information

The contact person for this RFP is René Beauchamp:

* Email: <rene.beauchamp@hc-sc.gc.ca>
* Phone: (613) 716-5315

Any questions or inquiries should be directed to René Beauchamp.

### Attachments

A set of related documents are attached to this RFP announcement:

* [Request for Bid 1000254829](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24485/request-for-bid-1000254829.pdf)
* [Non-Publication Protocol Bundle](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24485/npp--1000254829.pdf)
* [Questions and Answers: Questions et Réponses](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24485/questions-and-answers--questions-et-reponses.pdf)
